meanings.sent1: The integumentary system protects our body.
meanings.sent2: The doctor studied the integumentary system in detail.
meanings.sent3: The integumentary system threw a party for the other body systems.
meanings.sent4: Her integumentary system was like a shield against harm.
meanings.sent5: Learning about the integumentary system is fascinating.

meanings.definition: Consisting of the skin and its appendages.
meanings.sent1: My integumentary health is important to me.
meanings.sent2: The integumentary structures include hair and nails.
meanings.sent3: The integumentary party had skin as the DJ and nails as the dancers.
meanings.sent4: Her integumentary beauty shone like a star.
meanings.sent5: Taking care of your integumentary system means caring for your skin and its parts.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the covering of the body.
meanings.sent1: The integumentary layer shields us from harm.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the integumentary covering in medical school.
meanings.sent3: The integumentary blanket kept the body warm.
meanings.sent5: The integumentary protection is crucial for our health.
